statements: SELECT * FROM WasteManagementEquipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE category = 'Truck';
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_price FROM WasteManagementEquipment ORDER BY purchase_price DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM WasteManagementEquipment GROUP BY category;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE purchase_price > 5000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, equipment_id
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, category FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%monthly%'
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_price FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE category = 'Bins' AND last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND category IN ('Containers', 'Trucks')
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_price FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE purchase_price >= 1000 AND maintenance_schedule IS NULL ORDER BY equipment_name
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE type='computer';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM equipment ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type='repair' AND schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, type FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 AND purchase_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT id, name, maintenance_type, schedule_date FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, name, type FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, name, purchase_date FROM equipment WHERE maintenance_date IS NULL ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment.name, maintenance_schedule.maintenance_type, maintenance_schedule.schedule_date FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id;
SELECT id, type, quantity, maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT equipment_id, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_quantity FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Machine';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_worker FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_quantity, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE equipment_quantity > 5;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE equipment_quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Printer' AND last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT equipment_name, equipment_quantity FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY equipment_quantity ASC;
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM maintenance_log GROUP BY maintenance_type HAVING total_count > 3 ORDER BY total_count DESC;

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_worker FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_log ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_log.equipment_id WHERE equipment_type IN ('Computer', 'Printer') ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementEquipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM WasteManagementEquipment ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE maintenance_required = TRUE;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM EquipmentLocations WHERE location_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT log_id, equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_cost FROM EquipmentMaintenanceLog ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementEquipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE maintenance_required = TRUE;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE purchase_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedules ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(log_id) AS maintenance_count FROM EquipmentMaintenanceLog GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementEquipment ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_price FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE category = 'Recycling' ORDER BY purchase_price ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM MaintenanceEmployees WHERE employee_role = 'Technician' ORDER BY hire_date;
SELECT * FROM WasteManagementEquipment;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM WasteManagementEquipment WHERE purchase_price > 5000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_type, l.maintenance_notes FROM WasteManagementEquipment e JOIN MaintenanceSchedule m ON e.id = m.equipment_id JOIN MaintenanceLogs l ON m.id = l.maintenance_schedule_id WHERE l.maintenance_notes LIKE '%maintenance%';

SELECT e.equipment_name, COUNT(l.id) AS maintenance_count FROM WasteManagementEquipment e JOIN MaintenanceSchedule m ON e.id = m.equipment_id JOIN MaintenanceLogs l ON m.id = l.maintenance_schedule_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name;

SELECT e.equipment_name, l.maintenance_date FROM WasteManagementEquipment e LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedule m ON e.id = m.equipment_id LEFT JOIN MaintenanceLogs l ON m.id = l.maintenance_schedule_id WHERE l.maintenance_date IS NULL ORDER BY e.equipment_name ASC;
